component.name: Tanglet
component.summary: Varianta hry Boggle pro jednoho hráče
Variante de Boogle en mode simple joueur
Gra wariantu Boggle dla jednego gracza
Boggle - Variantă de joc într-un singur jucător

description.p: Tanglet is a single player word finding game based on Boggle. The object of the game is to list as many words as you can before the time runs out. There are several timer modes that determine how much time you start with, and if you get extra time when you find a word.

You can join letters horizontally, vertically, or diagonally in any direction to make a word, so as long as the letters are next to each other on the board. However, you can not reuse the same letter cells in a single word. Also, each word must be at least three letters on a normal board, and four letters on a large board.
